messages.title: IT’S A CONSERVATIVE MAJORITY OR A HUNG PARLIAMENT
messages.content: At the end of this election, we’ll either get a Conservative majority – or a hung parliament.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. With five long years of gridlock and uncertainty.

issues.governance: Don’t risk five long years of Corbyn in charge

contactInformation.address: Tudor House, Grammar School Road, North Walsham, NR28 9JH

quotes.text: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority
Jo Swinson says no to second Tory alliance
SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote

leaflet.additionalNotes: Your name and address were obtained from the Register of Electors, provided to me as an election candidate under the Representation of the People Act for the purposes of democratic engagement.
